info.title: Check a radio button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, check the radio button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, check the radio button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'checked', is conveyed
